data.title: Leading appliances companies by revenue 2023
data.meta_description: In 2023, six household appliances manufacturers worldwide surpassed 10 billion U.S.
data.text:
Supplementary notes

All figures have been rounded to provide a better understanding of the statistic. The country in brackets indicates where the company has its headquarter.

For companies that report their data in a currency other than U.S. dollars the data was converted to U.S. dollars at the currency rates shown below:

LG Electronics - KRW to USD at an exchange rate of 1 KRW - 0.00077 USD (December 31, 2023). Figure shown in the graph includes LG Electronics' revenue from its home appliance & air solutions segment.

Midea Group - CNY to USD at the exchange rate of 1 CNY - 0.14 USD (December 31, 2023). Figure shown in the graph includes Midea's revenue from its consumer electronics appliances segment.

BSH Home Appliances - EUR to USD at the exchange rate of 1 EUR - 1.1 USD (December 31, 2023).

Electrolux - SEK to USD at the exchange rate of 1 SEK - 0.099 USD (December 31, 2023)

Haier Smart Home - CNY to USD at the exchange rate of 1 CNY - 0.14 USD (December 31, 2023).

Groupe SEB - EUR to USD at the exchange rate of 1 EUR - 1.1 USD (December 31, 2023).

Arcelik EUR to USD at the exchange rate of 1 EUR - 1.1 USD (December 31, 2023).
